title: ebook-tools — Metrics QA
description: One panel per metric for visual smoke-testing of all ebook-tools Prometheus metrics

panels.title: Backup DB Tables
panels.description: Row counts from custom postgres-exporter queries — confirms PG data is present and queryable

panels.title: Backend Up
panels.description: Whether the k3s backend is reachable (port-forward must be active on :18000)

panels.title: Health
panels.description: Health status from the k3s-deployed backend

panels.title: Request Rate
panels.description: HTTP requests per second on the k3s backend

panels.title: Latency p95
panels.description: HTTP p95 latency on the k3s backend

panels.title: Errors & Failures
panels.description: Error and failure rates on the k3s backend
